description: [QUIETEXIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1084) can establish a TCP connection as part of its initial connection to the C2.(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22)

external_references.description: Mandiant. (2022, May 2). UNC3524: Eye Spy on Your Email. Retrieved August 17, 2023.
